Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • Node

  • class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Nodes that are used by the Binary Tree contains, the word stored, it's frequency, the left node, and the right node
    Since:
    March 26, 2020

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int frequency
      The number of times the word is repeated in the file

      The left node
      (package private) Node rightNode
      The right node
      (package private) java.lang.String word
      Word stored in the node
